parameters.name: maximum_children
parameters.description: Maximum number of children allowed. Default: 0 (no limit)

parameters.name: child_age_minimum

parameters.name: repeat_for
parameters.description: Number of events this series. Default: 6

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Interval in weeks between events. Default: 4

parameters.name: event_hosts_attributes
parameters.description: Array of adults present at host venue
